content: blanket consists of seven versions of square and diamond-shaped motifs that are all worked and then joined before border is added all around see colour placement chart for required colour numbers for each motif to help with placement of motifs write number of motif as indicated on schematic blanket layout on piece of paper and pin to motif cross out motifs made on colour placement chart to keep track of motifs made for most motifs colours are changed every round when joining round with slip_stitch unless otherwise stated do not cut yarn each round but carry it up on ws change colour as follows in the round work joining slip_stitch in old colour to final two loops on hook yoh with new colour pull through and make beg ch1 of next round with new colour beg ch1 does not count as st throughout unless otherwise stated **list of materials** **scheepjes scrumptious** 50% recycled polyester recycled plastic bottles 50% acrylic 100g/300m - 364 apple crumble x 2 balls for joining and border scheepjes scrumptious colour pack 50% recycled polyester recycled plastic bottles 50% acrylic 80 x 30g/97m -4mm crochet hook -stitch markers
